participant_1.background:
My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both.
i have 3 cats.
I never worry about my appearance because I have better things to think about.
I once had to work 100 hours in a week to meet a deadline.
my favourite food is ice cream.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy listening to music, especially The Lumineers.
i just got a new sweater.
I have a full life with my family and pets.
my children are a disappointment.
I live in a small town in the Midwest with my dog, Petrucci.

content.text: Hi there! I'm interested in meeting new people. How about you?
Hey there! I'd love to meet new people too. How was your day?
It was pretty good. I got a lot of work done and I had some time to relax too. What about you?
My day was pretty good too. I went for a walk in the park with my dog, and I did some shopping.
That sounds nice. I love going for walks in the park. I have three cats, so I can't really take them for walks.
Aww, I love cats! I have a dog named Petrucci. He's a really good boy.
I've heard good things about The Lumineers. I'll have to check them out.
You should! They're one of my favorite bands.
What are some other things you enjoy doing?
I like to read, watch movies, and play video games. I also like to go out to eat with my friends and family.
Those all sound like fun things to do. I like to read, watch movies, and go out to eat too.
It sounds like we have a lot in common.
I think so too. We should get to know each other better.
